commit.title: Implicit arguments: add support for giving implicit arguments by position.
commit.message:
Implicit arguments: add support for giving implicit arguments by position.

In addition to a syntax of the form (arg_2:=t), this adds a syntax of
the form (1:=t) to make explicit a non-dependent implicit
arguments. In (arg_2:=t), "2" is the position among all implicit
arguments. In (1:=t), "1" is the position among all non-dependent
implicit arguments.

At the same time, we improve the error message when the explicitation
of an implicit argument is ill-named or with a bad index.

TODO:
- For unnamed implicit arguments in inner positions: compute their
  non-dependent position.
- If arg_XX is kept as a valid name for anonymous implicit arguments,
  it should be mentioned by print_allowed_nondep_implicit.
- If it is decided that anonymous arguments are referred by order of
  non-dependent arguments, then the computation of the absolute
  position can be removed.
